references.paper_title: Community detection and stochastic block models: Recent developments
references.reason: Provides background on community detection, a problem closely related to the eigenvector estimation problems studied in this paper.

references.paper_title: Phase transition of the largest eigenvalue for nonnull complex sample covariance matrices
references.reason: Establishes a fundamental result on the phase transition of the largest eigenvalue in random matrices, which is crucial for understanding the behavior of spectral methods in low-rank matrix models.

references.paper_title: Rate-optimal perturbation bounds for singular subspaces with applications to high-dimensional statistics
references.reason: Provides rate-optimal perturbation bounds for singular subspaces, which are essential for analyzing the error of eigenvector estimation methods.

references.paper_title: Spectral methods for data science: A statistical perspective
references.reason: Offers a comprehensive overview of spectral methods in data science, providing the context and background for the current work.

references.paper_title: Asymptotic theory of eigenvectors for random matrices with diverging spikes
references.reason: Develops the asymptotic theory of eigenvectors for random matrices with diverging spikes, which is directly relevant to the analysis of low-rank signal-plus-noise models.
